https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bAHXPIZy1t8kiEqb7hn4BRbuuBd.jpg When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth. 40 Days and Nights
